com.kamontat.com.kamontat.server

Class GithubToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kamontat.com.kamontat.server.GithubToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GithubToken
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    this class very importance in GithubLoader class
    this will use to sign in into github by using Token Normally when you login, you need to enter username and p but to authentication, you can use token as the same way as username and p. you can getLog easy your token by login your github and go to this link
    • https://github.com/settings/tokens/new - To generate new token
    • https://github.com/settings/tokens - To manage your exist token
    and this class also use com.kamontat.cache to keep your encrypt token pass using Encryption class
    Since:
    1/28/2017 AD - 12:51 AM
    See Also:
    GithubLoader, Serializable, Cache, Encryption, Serialized Form

      • saveCache

        public boolean saveCache()
        save current github token into com.kamontat.cache file with option not use password
        Returns:
        true if save successfully; false otherwise

      • loadCache

        public static GithubToken loadCache(java.lang.String password)
        load github token from com.kamontat.cache file by using p that create when save com.kamontat.cache
        Parameters:
        password - decryption p
        Returns:
        real token if p correctly; false otherwise

      • loadCache

        public static GithubToken loadCache()
        load github token from com.kamontat.cache file by that must save with option not use password
        Returns:
        real token if and only if com.kamontat.cache save with option not use password, otherwise return empty token

        public static void removeCache()
